posts.post_content:
I have been wanting to add a Hindu (Brown) back for some time now. I have never owned one. I am interested in any player, lower grade so that it won't break the bank. I would perfer to have it graded but raw is fine as well. If anyone has one looking for a new home please e-mail me price info and scan... Thanks in advance Ralph

[url]rp12367@hotmail.com[/url]
